lead_paragraph: President Tayyip Erdogan said on Sunday that Turkey would fight to the end against all forms of attack by terror groups and their backers after a gunman killed 39 people in a shooting spree at an Istanbul nightclub.
snippet: President Tayyip Erdogan said on Sunday that Turkey would fight to the end against all forms of attack by terror groups and their backers after a gunman killed 39 people in a shooting spree at an Istanbul nightclub....

headline.main: Erdogan Says Turkey Will Fight to End Against Terror Attacks
headline.print_headline: Erdogan Says Turkey Will Fight to End Against Terror Attacks
